overview: Recently appointed as Global Head of Technology and Delivery, Alessandro Gatteschi is responsible for the development, implementation and management of the Group’s technical operations, coordinating a team of 400 collaborators based throughout the various geographic regions where Buongiorno operates. Before joining Buongiorno, Gatteschi was with IBM for 5 years as their Strategic Sales Engagement Executive and handled the coordination of the company’s most important outsourcing initiatives in Europe. Prior to that, he was with FIAT, coordinating the initial phases of the joint venture start-up with IBM, and he worked for EDS for several years, where he managed the IT infrastructure operations organizations for Italian Accounts, coordinating both large-scale technical projects and organizational integration projects. Alessandro Gatteschi, 50, graduated in Electronic Engineering from Turin Polytechnic.
